dcterms:description: The dataset is made up of multiple simulations of the wear in a turbine engine, consisting of training data with 100 different simulations and test data with 100 different simulations. Each simulation starts at a random point in the wear process and ends either after an error occurs or before it occurs. The dataset includes 24 attributes, with 3 related to Operational Settings and the rest being sensor measurements connected to the state of the machine.
dcterms:title: Turbofan wear dataset
